title: Bill Announcement - H.R. 1512 (Federal Aviation Administration Extension Act of 2009) | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




March 30, 2009

 



Bill Announcement - H.R. 1512 (Federal Aviation Administration Extension Act of 2009)




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  ________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                       March 30, 2009  STATEMENT BY THE PRESS SECRETARY   On Monday, March 30, 2009, the President signed into law: H.R. 1512, the "Federal Aviation Administration Extension Act of 2009," which extends through September 30, 2009, authorities to: collect taxes that fund the Airport and Airway Trust Fund; make expenditures from the Airport and Airway Trust Fund; and make grants to airports under the Airport Improvement Program.
